Cynthia Piña
============

[Mayor & City Council](http://www.southhoustontx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=22)  
Title: Councilwoman  
Phone: [713-947-7700](tel:7139477700)
  
[Cynthia Piña Page](http://www.southhoustontx.gov/175/Position-3---Cynthia-Pia)
  
[Email Cynthia Piña](mailto:pinacynthia2011@yahoo.com)
